I urge all Members to vote for American workers and businesses and support the reauthorization of the @ExImBankUS today.
The @ExImBankUS reauthorization enjoys strong support from labor and the business community, including @USChamber, @MachinistsUnion, and @ShopFloorNAM.

Today‚Äôs bill will help ensure @ExImBankUS can continue to support job creation by: 
- Reauthorizing the agency for 10 years,
- Increasing the agency‚Äôs lending capacity,
- Ensuring the agency can continue to finance large projects even if the Senate fails to confirm Board members.
The @ExImBankUS is a good deal for American taxpayers. Over the past 10 years, the agency has generated more than $3.4 billion in deficit reduction.
In Fiscal Year 2018, 90% of @ExImBankUS authorizations directly supported small businesses, including 315 small businesses that used the agency for the first time.
Over the last ten years, @ExImBankUS has financed more than $255.2 billion in U.S. exports and supported 1.6 million U.S. jobs in all 50 states at no cost to American taxpayers.

The @ExImBankUS has been a major success story in countering aggressive foreign export credit agencies, including three in China alone, that finance exports from the global competitors of American businesses.

Today, the House will vote to reauthorize @ExImBankUS, which plays a critical role in helping businesses in the U.S. maintain a strong, competitive presence in the global economy. https://bit.ly/2NTfQNf¬†
